mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectClmErpTrnsmis Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , CLM_NO , CLM_ERP_TRNSMIS_TP_CD , ERP_TRNSMIS_CD , ERP_TRNSMIS_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CLM_ERP_TRNSMIS WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CLM_NO = #{clmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CLM_ERP_TRNSMIS_TP_CD = #{clmErpTrnsmisTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ERP_TRNSMIS_CD = #{erpTrnsmisCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
